post.author: 이계영
post.content:
최근 며칠 사이에 에이전트로 부터 몇개의 이메일을 받았는데, 대부분이 아주 오래전에 보낸 이력서를 보고 연락을 했더군요. 그중 한 에이전트는 "the marketplace is heating up"이라고 하는군요. 잡을 알아보시는 분들에게는 좋은 기회라고 생각합니다.
그중 한 에이전트가 다음과 같은 개발자를 구하고 있습니다(다른 에이전트들은 구체적으로 기술한것이 없어서, 연락을 해보고 가능한 여기에 포스팅하도록 하겠습니다):
As Systems Analyst, you will have an analysis and programming background working with web technology and database systems such as Oracle . You have worked within a formal systems analysis and design methodology, and are able to write high level and detailed requirements and design documentation ( ie user requirements, version descriptions and other documents). Your written communication skills must be very good and you must still have the ability to read code and estimate the impact of requested changes on the existing systems. This is considered an Intermediate level position within the team.
NOTE Candidates could be an existing Progammer Analysts who has had analysis and design experience, has an interest/aptitude for this work, and wishes to do this full time . There will be very little coding in this job - the emphasis of the work is analyzing and documenting the existing reporting systems which will be re-engineered beginning in 2004 for deployment on as J2EE apps on WebLogic server.
Requirements · Post-secondary degree in Computer Science or equivalent work experience · 3-5 years of experience in systems analysis support/development and process development · Expertise in systems processes analysis, relational databases, client-server system architecture, web system architecture · Strong team management and interpersonal skills · Attentive to detail and work plan deadlines · Excellent oral and written communication skills including facilitation and presentation skills · Knowledge of industry best practices in work planning, software testing, gathering requirements, documenting functional specifications and software quality assurance techniques · Ability to work a flexible schedule to accommodate project deadlines including limited travel and on call rotation
Technical Skills needed: a programming background with Java ( servlets, JSP) , XML, CORBA , and the ability to write clear and concise systems documentation
Assets
Previous Experience in Dental Insurance and/or extended health insurance industry.
관심있으신 분은 제에게 이력서를 보내주세요. jameslee99@sympatico
post.title: Job market is heating up
